授業目的: The purpose of this course is to prepare students to write an academic essay.
到達目標:
Students will be able to understand how to choose a good topic to write about.
Students will be able to create a reading list and schedule for their research.
特記事項: この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。
授業の概要・背景: Students will choose a topic they are interested in and write an essay on this topic. Writing time will be given in class, as well as homework. Due to the small size of this class, students will get the opportunity to interact with the teacher a lot. This class will be especially useful for students who plan to study abroad.

第1回:
Introduction
Course overview - choosing a title, research reading, note-taking, writing and editing draft 1, and finally, writing and editing the final draft.
Each week students must work on their essay.
第2回: How to choose a good title for an essay.
Make a short-list of 4 or 5 possible titles.
第3回: Short-list of titles and final choice of title.
第4回: Instruction on how to make a list of research reading and how to use the library
第5回: Instruction on note-taking skills for reading
第11回:
Write first draft
How to manage your schedule.
How to manage a drop in motivation.
第20回: Write first draft to hand-in next class
第21回:
Hand -in first draft
Discuss problems and worries
第22回: Feedback on first draft and ideas for final draft
第25回: Prepare FINAL draft for next class.
